synopsis.text: Little Coco loves wearing the penguin coat given to her by her late father, who told her she could fly like a penguin. One night while out exploring, Coco follows a strange cat into a magical realm inhabited by goblins and elves. There she learns of an ancient prophecy about a flightless hero who will save the land from the evil Emperor of Darkness. The goblins mistake Coco for the Chosen One foretold in the prophecy. Meanwhile, the Emperor plots to blanket the realm in darkness with help from Zammie, a fallen angel. As Coco befriends the quirky goblin Chaley and other forest folk, she discovers that maybe she has the power to stand up to the darkness after all. Join Coco on her soaring adventures in the whimsical land of elves and goblins. Will a little girl in a penguin coat be able to master flight and restore light to the realm? Find out in this feel-good fantasy tale!
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
